Properties.Value:
SORTING("Entry No.")
                      ORDER(descending)
                      WHERE("Entry Type" = FILTER("Assembly Consumption"))
Properties.Name: SourceTableView

Properties.Value: Lookup("Posted Assemble-to-Order Link"."Order No." WHERE("Assembly Document No." = FIELD("No.")))
Properties.Name: CalcFormula

Subtype.Name: Line Fee Note on Report Hist.

Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to record the related interactions with the involved contact person in the Interaction Log Entry table.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the report to include information about components that were used in linked assembly orders that supplied the item(s) being sold. (Only possible for RDLC report layout.)
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies that shipments are shown on the document.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if you want notes about additional fees to be shown on the document.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: SORTING("VAT Identifier", "VAT Calculation Type", "Tax Group Code", "Use Tax", Positive)
Properties.Name: DataItemTableView

Properties.Value: SORTING("VAT Identifier", "VAT Calculation Type", "Tax Group Code", "Use Tax", Positive)
Properties.Name: DataItemTableView

Properties.Value: Specifies if an account statement is included for all customers with entries by the end of the statement period, as specified in the date filter.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if an account statement is included for all customers with a balance by the end of the statement period, as specified in the date filter.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to update the Last Statement No. field on each customer card after it prints the customer's statement. Do not select this check box if you are not using statement numbers, if you are just viewing the statements, or if you are printing statements which will not be sent to the customer.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if your company address is printed at the top of the sheet, because you do not use pre-printed paper. Leave this check box blank to omit your company's address.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies how to print the statement. Balance: Prints balance forward statements that list all entries made during the statement period that you specify in the date filter. Open Item: Prints open item statements that list all entries that are still open as of the date that you specify in the date filter.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies how aging is calculated. Due Date: Aging is calculated by the number of days that the transaction is overdue. Trans Date: Aging is calculated by the number of days since the transaction posting date. Document Date: Aging is calculated by the number of days since the document date.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the length of each of the aging periods. For example, enter 30D to base aging on 30-day intervals.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to record the related interactions with the involved contact person in the Interaction Log Entry table.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the output of the scheduled report, such as PDF or Word.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies that amounts that remain to be paid will be included.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: "Customer No." = FIELD("No."), "Global Dimension 1 Code" = FIELD("Global Dimension 1 Filter"), "Global Dimension 2 Code" = FIELD("Global Dimension 2 Filter")
Properties.Name: DataItemLink

Properties.Value: "Customer No." = FIELD("No."), "Global Dimension 1 Code" = FIELD("Global Dimension 1 Filter"), "Global Dimension 2 Code" = FIELD("Global Dimension 2 Filter")
